author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Virtusa Announces Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.55
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Virtusa Corp:
* VIRTUSA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.55
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q4 REVENUE $281.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $280.5 MILLION
* SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 TO $0.51
* SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $293.5 MILLION TO $301.5 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.55 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2019 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 TO $0.66 * SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.08 TO $2.32
* FY EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.22, REVENUE VIEW $1.21 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
